title: 156 SFS Riot Training June 1 (Air National Guard)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Defense Visual Information Distribution Service (DVIDS) photos show that 156th Security Forces Squadron, Puerto Rico Air National Guard practiced riot control training at Muñiz Air National Guard Base, Carolina, Puerto Rico on or around June 1, 2024. (https://www.dvidshub.net/image/8464113/156-sfs-domestic-operations-training)

Therefore, I request the following records:

1) Any communications, emails, text messages, and attachments exchanged between your department and other military departments involved in the training exercise (including but not limited to: US Army, Marines, US Navy, US Army Reserve).

3) Any presentations, presentation attachments, and instructional materials (these include but are not limited to audio, video, PowerPoint presentations, and slide formats) concerning the training exercise that took place in Puerto Rico on or about June 1, 2024.

4) Any maps used in the planning of and during the training exercise that took place in Puerto Rico on or about June 1, 2024

This request is for all records produced between May 15, 2024 and the time this request is processed.

This request is not being used for commercial purposes. I am an independent journalist and documents obtained by this request will be used in the course of reporting on military exercises in Puerto Rico.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco

title: Public Safety Academy Proposal (Department of Correction)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

The initial project proposal for an expanded Public Safety Academy in College Point, Queens.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

New York Focus
